dish_description: A selection of fresh raw fish and seafood served on seasoned rice, accompanied by wasabi and soy sauce. Note: 12 pieces per portion.
Lightly battered and fried shrimp and vegetables, served with a dipping sauce
A hearty noodle soup with broth, vegetables, and your chicken. This is the most popular dish from the Nippon restaurant.
A hearty noodle soup with broth, vegetables, and pork. This is the most popular dish from the Nippon restaurant.
A hearty noodle soup with broth, vegetables, and tofu. This is the most popular dish from the Nippon restaurant.
Grilled chicken marinated in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice and vegetables. This is the most popular chicken dish across all restaurants.
Pan-fried dumplings filled with pork and vegetables, served with a tangy dipping sauce. Note: 5 pieces per portion.
A colorful bowl of sushi rice topped with an assortment of sashimi, vegetables, and tamago (sweet omelette)
Skewers of grilled chicken, vegetables, and tofu, glazed with a teriyaki sauce
A traditional Japanese soup made with miso paste, tofu, seaweed, and green onions
A savory pancake made with cabbage, pork, and seafood, topped with a sweet and tangy sauce
Creamy and refreshing ice cream infused with the earthy flavors of matcha green tea
